name: Material Feedly
description:
UPDATE: I have switched to Inoreader. For information as to why, see below. 

I have started a similar style (Material Inoreader) which can be found here: https://userstyles.org/styles/143062/material-inoreader
additional_info:
UPDATE: I have switched to Inoreader. Similar style (Material Inoreader) found here: https://userstyles.org/styles/143062/material-inoreader

NOTICE: The Feedly team has reformatted its content (breaking this userstyle) and has decided to remove the Full Article view. If/When the full article view returns to feedly I will update this userstyle to work with the new code, but until then this will be on hold and I will be looking for a new RSS reader (if anyone has a suggestion, please post below. Thanks). I apologize for any inconvenience.

If someone wants to take over and use the code contained here please feel free. Open non-commercial license.

A fully responsive Material Design inspired Feedly style.

Supports Feedly's built in "themes" so you can continue to choose your own sidebar color.

0.47 - Another quick fix to keep up with Feedly's changing code (Add button).

0.46 - Quick fix to keep up with Feedly's changing code.

0.45 - Increased font weight on Magazine/Grouped by Feeds views. (Thanks, cchloevil)

0.44 - More quick fixes for changes made by Feedly. Also a couple fixes to Cards/Today views. (Thanks, Rhamirez)

0.43 - Quick fix for latest Feedly change that broke style.

0.42 - Small changes.

0.41 - Fixed "add content" again. Not sure if Feedly keeps changing this or if something is wrong on my end. Moved "add content" and "pin/unpin" slightly to the left in case there is a scroll bar.


0.4 - Fixed "add content" to work with Feedly update.

0.3 - Sidebar. Todo: Add color option and fix "+" for "add content".

0.2 - All article views now fully supported. Other small fixes.

(Please report any problems/bugs below. Thanks.)
